description: This file defines an interface class 'IOmiProxy' within the 'omi' namespace. The class provides methods to mount and unmount crypted bundles, and to register/unregister error listeners, serving as a wrapper around an omi_dbus_api for simplifying method calls and signal handling.

classes.name: IOmiProxy
classes.description: An interface class for managing crypted containers and error signals via omi_dbus_api.

methods.name: mountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Mounts a crypted container bundle given an ID and file paths; outputs the bundle path on success.

methods.name: umountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Unmounts a crypted container bundle identified by its ID.

methods.name: registerListener
methods.description: Registers an error listener callback and returns a listener ID.

methods.name: unregisterListener
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered error listener by its ID.

ctags.name: OmiErrorListener
ctags.pattern: /^    typedef std::function<void(const std::string&, ErrorType, const void*)> OmiErrorListener;$/
